metadata.title: CVE-2014-8096 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
The SProcXCMiscGetXIDList function in the XC-MISC extension in X.Org XWindow System (aka X11 or X) X11R6.0 and X.Org Server (aka xserver andxorg-server) before 1.16.3 allows remote authenticated users to cause adenial of service (out-of-bounds read or write) or possibly executearbitrary code via a crafted length or index value.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8096` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xdmx-tools - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xnest - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xorg-server-source - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xserver-common - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xserver-xorg-xmir - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
xvfb - 2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: xorg-server package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2:1.15.1-0ubuntu2.4').
